thread.title: George Clooney's mom says her son will make a great dad | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: George Clooney's mom says her son will make a great dad | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Jones For Dailymail.Com
title: George Clooney's mom says her son will make a great dad | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The Talk 's Julie Chen announced the couple's double joy on Thursday's show after confirming the news with the Ocean's Eleven star. 'Beyoncé is not the only superstar expecting twins,' Chen, 47, said on the CBS show. 'They told us together': The Oscar winner, 55, and Amal Clooney, 39, are expecting for the first time and having a boy and girl which are due this June 'Congratulations are in order for George and Amal Clooney!' The talk show host added: 'What we did find out is that the twins are due this June.' George's longtime friend and frequent co-star Matt Damon, 46, was thrilled for the couple and admitted he 'almost started crying' when he found out the news. The Bourne Identity actor said: 'I was working with him last fall and he pulled me aside on set and I mean, I almost started crying. I was so happy for him. And I was like, "How far along is she?" And he goes, "Eight weeks."' 'I'm thrilled for him,' Matt told ET Canada . 'She's amazing. He hit the jackpot. Just on every level. She is a remarkable woman. They're gonna be great. They're gonna be awesome parents. Those kids are lucky.' 'Congratulations': The Talk's Julie Chen announced the couple's double joy on Thursday's show after confirming the news with the Ocean's Eleven star A source told InTouch in January that Amal, who is of Lebanese-British descent, 'is pregnant with twins: a boy and a girl.' The couple 'feel like they’ve hit the family jackpot' in light of the big news, the source told the magazine. 'When George and Amal found out it was twins they were surprised,' the source said, 'but also a little scared because they both had said that one was enough. 'But the news that it was a boy and a girl made them both really happy... they can’t believe in just a few months, they’re going to have two babies.' 'Thrilled': George's longtime friend and frequent co-star Matt Damon, 46, was thrilled for the couple and admitted he 'almost started crying' when he found out the news. They are pictured together in June 2007 George and Amal met through mutual friends at a charity fundraising event in September 2013. When their romance went public a source said: 'Clooney asked her out for dinner and she put him off twice, saying she was too busy, before accepting the third time. She was operating on the lines of "treat 'em mean, keep 'em keen".' The couple got engaged less than a year later in April 2014 and married on September 27, 2014 at Ca'Farsetti Palace - located in Venice, Italy in front of 100 guests. Red carpet romance: George and Amal - pictured in May 2016 - met through mutual friends at a charity fundraising event in September 2013 and tied the knot one year later in September 2014 Read more:
